name: ScienceSoft
overview:
Founded in 1989, ScienceSoft Inc. is one of the most mature IT outsourcing providers in Eastern Europe. Headquartered in Minsk, Belarus, ScienceSoft operates an EU subsidiary in Helsinki, Finland. The company’s highlights include 300 experienced professionals, ISO 9001 certified processes and over 20 years of market experience. ScienceSoft has the status of an Oracle Partner and an IBM Partner. The company has attained a number of Microsoft competences, among which are Silver Application Integration, Silver Mobility and Silver Web Development competences. ScienceSoft has been a member of Belarus Hi-Tech Park since 2006 and an IBM PartnerWorld member since 2010. In 2011 ScienceSoft was listed among TOP 5 Belarusian Software Exporters.

ScienceSoft service offerings embrace outsourced product development, custom application development, mobile/wireless application development, Microsoft business platform and technology consulting, Oracle technology consulting, software testing, as well as SIEM solutions consulting and implementation including.

The global client base exceeds one hundred companies, from small businesses to Fortune 500 multinationals in 24 countries.
